description: The Gurren Lagann, the titular mech of the series, is piloted jointly by two pilots for most of the story, with the Lagann portion always operated by the series` main protagonist Simon and the Gurren piloted by Kamina initially and then various other characters after his death. The mech was originally formed as a hotblooded response from Kamina to the Enki`s initial two-headed configuration.
name: Gurren Lagann
